sentence.Network_en: The snowbank at the side of the road provided a shelter from the piercing wind.
sentence.Network_cn: 路边的雪墙挡住了刺骨的寒风.

sentence.Network_en: Our snowballs were the seeds for the magic snowbank.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的雪球是魔法雪堆的种子.

sentence.Network_en: Then, Papa would start talking about the importance of the magic snowbank.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后, 爷爷开始说起魔法雪堆的重要性.
